title: VariSAC: V2X Assured Connectivity in RIS-Aided ISAC via GNN-Augmented Reinforcement Learning
summary: This paper explores dynamic spatial resource management and real-time adaptation in vehicular networks through the integration of Reconfigurable Intelligent Surfaces (RIS) and Integrated Sensing and Communication (ISAC), addressing challenges in unified reliability modeling and resource optimization.
